content.p: A repository for storing and promoting your research data. The Research Data Repository (a joint initiative between DTS and Libraries) can be used to store and share your data, as well as promote your work. PGRs, post-docs and research staff. Free for deposits up to 50GB, thereafter Â£38 per TB/yr. Visit the repository here: https://rdmc.nottingham.ac.uk/ Deposit your data here. For support, please email: library-researchsupport@nottingham.ac.uk More information on the Repository can be found here. If you're struggling please get in touch with the team Submit and track requests to solve your IT issues Updates on the University's core IT services
